tuv.seg: After you are arrested, you may be taken into custody in a Garda station
Tar éis duine a ghabháil beidh sé/sí faoi choiméad i stáisiún na Gardaí
There are rules and procedures as to how you must be treated whilst in custody
Tá rialacha agus módh oibre a bhaineann leis an mbealach nach mór caitheamh leis an duine atá faoi choimeád
These rules and procedures are derived from Regulation 8 of the Criminal Justice Act 1984 (Treatment of Persons in Custody in Garda Síochána Stations) Regulations 1987 and 2006

Tá na rialacha agus na módh oibre a dhíorthaítear ó Rialachán 8 den Acht um Cheartas Coiriúil 1984 (An Bhail a Chuirfear ar Dhaoine Faoi Choimeád i Stáisiúin an Gharda Síochána ) Rialacháin 1987 agus 2006
The member in charge at the Garda station should inform you of these rights and give you a copy of them when your details are being entered in the custody record
Ba chóir don chomhalta i gceannas ag an stáisiún Garda eolas a thabhairt duit de na cearta sin agus a thabhairt duit cóip acu nuair do chuid sonraí á iontráil sa taifead faoi choimeád
After you have been arrested, you must be informed without delay
Tar éis duine a ghabháil ní mór é/í a chur ar an eolas gan moill
• why you have been arrested (i.e., the offence)
• cén fáth go bhfuil sé/sí gafa (i.e., an choir)
• that you are entitled to consult a solicitor and
• go bhfuil sé de cheart aige/aici labhairt le dlíodóir agus
• that you are entitled to notify another person that you are in custody
• go bhfuil sé de cheart aige/aici a chur in iúl do dhuine eile go bhfuil sé/sí faoi choiméad
If you are under 18 years of age, you must be informed that your parent or guardian is being informed and requested to attend at the station
Má tá an duine faoi 18 bliain d'aois, ní mór a chur in iúl dó/dí go bhfuil scéal dhá chur chuig a t(h)uismitheoir nó chuig a c(h)oimirceoir teacht chuig an stáisiún
A custody record must be kept in respect of every person in custody
Ní mór taifead coimeádta a choinneáil i dtaobh gach duine atá faoi choimeád
If you are transferred to another Garda station, the member in charge of the station from which you were transferred must send the custody record with you
Má aistrítear duine chuig stáisiún eile Gardaí, ní mór don Gharda a bhí i gceannas an chéad stáisiún an taifead coimeádta a chur chuig an dara stáisiún in éineacht leis an duine
Notification to solicitor or other persons
Dlíodóir nó Daoine eile a chur ar an eolas

If you are under 18 years of age, the member in charge of the Garda station concerned will, as soon as possible, inform your parent or guardian that you are in custody, why you are in custody and that you have a right to consult a solicitor

Má tá an duine faoi 18 bliain d'aois, cuirfidh an Garda atá i gceannas an stáisiúin in iúl chomh luath agus is féidir do thuismitheoir nó do choimirceoir go bhfuil an duine faoi choimeád, cén fáth atá leis agus go bhfuil sé de cheart aige/aici dul i gcomhairle dlíodóra
If you are 18 years or over and you have asked for a solicitor or that another person be notified, the member in charge of the station must notify the solicitor or other person as soon as possible

Más duine atá ós cionn 18 atá i gceist agus má d'iarr an duine sin labhairt le dlíodóir nó go gcuirfí scéal chuig duine eile, ní mór don Gharda i gceannas scéal a chur chuig an dlíodóir nó an duine eile chomh luath agus is féidir

If the solicitor or other person cannot be contacted within a reasonable time or if the solicitor or other person is unable to or unwilling to attend, you must be given an opportunity to ask for another solicitor or another person

Muna féidir dul i dteagmháil leis an dlíodóir nó leis an duine eile taobh istigh d'achar réasúnta ama nó muna bhfuil an dlíodóir ná an duine eile in ann teacht nó muna bhfuil fonn orthu teacht chuig an stáisiún, ní mór deis a thabhairt don duine atá cúisithe dlíodóir eile nó duine eile a ghlaoch isteach
If you are transferred to another station, your solicitor or other nominated person must be notified of the transfer as soon as possible
Má dhéantar duine a aistriú chuig stáisiún eile ní mór é sin a chur in iúl dá d(h)líodóir nó do dhuine eile ainmnithe chomh luath agus is féidir
Information about where you are being kept in custody must be given to
Ní mór a chur in iúl do na daoine seo a leanas cén áit ina bhfuil duine dhá choimeád
• any solicitor who enquires if you consent and
• aon dlíodóir a fhiosraíonn má tá an duine atá cúisithe sásta leis sin agus
• any other person if you consent and the member in charge of the station is satisfied that the information will not hinder or delay the investigation of crime
• aon duine eile, má aontaíonn an té atá cúisithe, agus má tá an Garda i gceannas sásta nach gcuirfidh an t-eolas sin isteach ar fhiosrú na coire nó nach gcuirfidh sé moill ar an bhfiosrú
You must be given reasonable access to a solicitor of your choice and be allowed to communicate with him or her privately
Ní mór fáil réasúnta a bheith ag duine ar a rogha dlíodóra agus a bheith in ann teagmháil a bheith aige/aici leis/léi go príobháideach

If you have not had access to a solicitor and a solicitor who has not been requested presents himself or herself at the station, you must be given the opportunity to consult with the solicitor if you wish

Muna bhfuil dlíodóir faigthe ag duine agus má thagann dlíodóir nár ghlaoigh an duine air/uirthi chuig an stáisiún, ní mór an deis a thabhairt don té atá cúisithe dul i gcomhairle an dlíodóra más mian leis/léi é sin a dhéanamh
A consultation with a solicitor may take place in the sight but out of the hearing of a Garda
Is féidir leis an té atá cúisithe a bheith le feiceáil ag Garda agus é/í ag labhairt le dlíodóir ach gan an comhrá a bheith le cloisteáil ag an nGarda
You may receive a visit from a relative, friend or any other person with an interest in your welfare, provided that you wish to see the person
Is féidir le gaol, cara nó aon duine eile gur spéis leis/léi leas an duine atá cúisithe a theacht ar chuairt chuige/chuici, chomh fada agus go bhfuil an té atá cúisithe sásta an duine sin a fheiceáil
The member in charge of the station must be satisfied that the visit can be adequately supervised and will not hinder or delay the investigation of crime

Ní mór don Gharda atá i gceannas an stáisiúin a bheith sásta gur féidir súil oiriúnach a choinneáil ar an gcuairt agus nach gcuirfear isteach ar fhiosrú na coire agus nach gcuirfear moill ar an bhfiosrú dá bharr
You may send a letter or make a telephone call of reasonable duration free of charge to a person if the member in charge is satisfied that it will not hinder or delay the investigation of crime

Is féidir le duine atá cúisithe litir a sheoladh nó glaoch telefóin ar feadh achar oiriúnach a dhéanamh in aisce má tá an Garda i gceannas sásta nach gcuirfear isteach ar fhiosrú na coire agus nach gcuirfear moill ar an bhfiosrú dá bharr
A Garda may listen to the phone call and may end it and may read any letter and refuse to send it
Is féidir le Garda éisteacht leis an gcomhrá telefóin agus deireadh a chur leis ag am ar bith agus aon litir a léamh agus diúltú í a sheoladh
Before you have a supervised visit or communicate with a person other than your solicitor, you must be informed that anything you say during the visit or in the communication may be given in evidence

Roimh a thagann aon duine ar chuairt chuig duine atá cúisithe nó roimh a dhéanann sé/sí teagmháil le duine eile seachas an dlíodóir, ní mór do na Gardaí a chur in iúl dó/dí gur féidir aon rud a dheireann an duine atá cúisithe a úsáid mar fhianaise
If you are searched by a Garda, he or she must make sure that you understand the reason for the search and that it is conducted with due respect to you
Má dhéanann Garda duine a chuardach ní mór dó/dí a chur in iúl go hiomlán cén fáth atá leis an gcuardach agus ní mór an cuardach a dhéanamh ar bhealach ómósach
You must not be searched by a person (other than a doctor) of the opposite sex
Ní féidir le fear bean a chuardach, ná le bean fear a chuardach, ach amháin sa chás gur dochtúir atá ann/inti
Where a search of your person involves removal of clothing, other than headgear or outer clothing, there must be no person of the opposite sex present unless that person is a doctor
Más gá éadaí a bhaint den duine (seachas hataí nó cótaí) ní féidir le haon duine den ghnéas eile a bheith i láthair ach amháin gur dochtúir é/í an duine sin
However, a person of the opposite sex may be present if the member in charge considers it necessary because of your violent behaviour
Ach, is féidir le duine den ghnéas eile a bheith i láthair má cheapann an Garda i gceannas go bhfuil gá leis de bharr iompar foréigneach an duine atá le cuardach
If your clothes or shoes are retained by the Gardai, you must be supplied with replacements of a reasonable standard
Má choinníonn na Gardaí éadaí nó bróga an té atá cúisithe ní mór cuid eile de chaighdeán réasúnta a chur ar fáil ina n-áit
A record must be made of the search stating the name of the person conducting the search, the names of those present and details of any property taken from or handed over by you

Ní mór taifead a choinneál den chuardach, ainm an té a bhí i mbun an chuardaigh, ainmneacha na ndaoine eile a bhí i láthair agus sonraí aon mhaoin a baineadh den duine nó a thug an duine féin do na Gardaí
Fingerprints and other samples
Méarloirg agus samplaí eile
Your fingerprints, photographs, saliva, hair and certain other samples can be taken without your consent
Is féidir le do méarloirg, grianghraif, seile, gruaig agus samplaí áirithe eile a ghlacadh gan do thoiliú
Your consent is required before the following samples can be taken and they must be taken by a doctor or dentist as appropriate:
Tá do thoiliú ag teastáil sular féidir na samplaí seo a leanas a ghlacadh, agus ní mór iad a glacadh ag dochtúir nó fiaclóir mar is iomchuí:
• Blood, urine or pubic hair
• Fola, fual nó gruaig phúbasach
• A swab from your genital region or any body opening, other than your mouth
• Sváb ó do réigiún na mball giniúna nó aon oscailt chomhlacht, seachas do bhéal
The consent must be signed and recorded in the custody record
Ní mór an toiliú a shíniú agus a thaifeadadh sa taifead faoi choimeád
You must be allowed as much time to rest as necessary
Ní mór a oiread ama a theastaíonn a thabhairt don duine atá cúisithe scíth a ligean
You must be provided with as many meals as are necessary
Ní mór béilte a chur ar fáil don duine mar is gá
You must be given at least two light meals and one main meal in any 24-hour period
Ní mór ar a laghad dhá mhionbhéile agus béile mór amháin a chur ar fáil in aon tréimhse 24 uair
You may have meals supplied at your own expense where it is practicable for the Garda to arrange this
Is féidir le duine béilte a sholáthar ag a c(h)ostas féin má tá sé indéanta do na Gardaí é seo a shocrú
You must be provided with access to toilet facilities
Ní mór go mbeadh duine in ann úsáid a bhaint as áiseanna leithris
When it is necessary to put you in a cell, you will, as far as possible, be held on your own in the cell
Más gá duine a chur isteach i gcillín ní mór, chomh fada agus is féidir, an duine a bheith coinnithe i gcillín leis/léi féin
Persons of the opposite sex must not be placed in a cell together
Ní féidir daoine den ghnéas eile a chur sa chillín céanna
A violent person must not be placed in a cell with another person if this can be avoided
Más féidir é a sheachaint ní ceart duine foréigeanach a chur isteach i gcillín in éineacht le duine eile
While you are in a cell, a Garda will visit you approximately every 30 minutes
Ba cheart do Gharda teacht ar chuairt chuig duine i gcillín chuile 30 nóiméad nó mar sin
A drunken person or a person under the influence of drugs will be visited and spoken to and if necessary roused every 15 minutes for a period of 2 hours or longer if his or her condition warrants it

Ba cheart dul isteach chuig duine atá ar meisce nó faoi thionchar drugaí agus labhairt leis/léi agus más gá é/í a dhúisiú chuile 15 nóiméad ar feadh tréimhse 2 uair an chloig nó níos faide má theastaíonn sé ag brath ar an staid ina bhfuil sé/sí ann
A Garda will always be accompanied when visiting a person of the opposite sex who is alone in a cell
Ba cheart go mbeadh duine in éineacht le Garda má tá sé/sí ag teacht isteach i gcillín duine den ghnéas eile agus an duine sin sa chillín leis/léi féin

If you are under the age of 18 years, you will not be kept in a cell unless there is no other secure accommodation available and, where practicable, you will not be placed in a cell with an adult other than an adult relative

Má tá an duine faoi 18 bliain d'aois ní ceart é/í a choinneáil i gcillín ach amháin sa chás nach bhfuil aon áit eile slán ar fáil, agus más féidir, ní chuirfear an duine sin isteach i gcillín in éineacht le duine fásta nach bhfuil gaol aige/aici leis/léi
No Garda can subject you to ill-treatment of any kind or the threat of ill-treatment (whether against you, your family or any other person connected with you) or permit any other person to do so

Ní ceart d'aon Gharda drochíde a thabhairt d'aon duine atá faoi choimeád nó drochíde a bhagairt (air/uirthi nó ar a c(h)lann/teaghlach ná ar aon duine eile a bhaineann leis an té atá cúisithe) nó cead a thabhairt d'aon duine eile drochíde a thabhairt don duine atá faoi choimeád
No Garda can use force against you unless such reasonable force as is necessary
Ní ceart d'aon Gharda neart a úsáid ach amháin neart réasúnta a bhfuil gá leis
• to make sure that you comply with lawful directions
• le cinntiú go gcomhlíonann duine treoracha dleathúla
• to prevent your escape or
• le cosc a chur ar dhuine ealú nó
• to restrain you from injuring yourself or others, damaging property or destroying or interfering with evidence
• le duine a stopadh é/í féin nó daoine eile a ghortú, damáiste a dhéanamh do mhaoin, nó é a loit nó cur isteach ar fhianaise
If you allege physical ill-treatment, the member in charge of the station will arrange for you to be medically examined
Má dhéanann duine gearán gur tugadh drochíde dó/dí déanfaidh an Garda i gceannas socrú go dtiocfaidh dochtúir le scrúdú a dhéanamh ar an duine

However, if you have made the allegation about another Garda, the member in charge of the station may not order the medical examination if he or she considers the complaint to be frivolous or vexatious
Ach, más gearán i gcoinne Garda eile atá i gceist ní gá don Gharda i gceannas an scrúdú dochtúra sin a ordú má cheapann sé/sí gur gearán fánach nó ciapálach atá ann
• are under the influence of alcohol or drugs and cannot be roused
• faoi thionchar alcóil nó drugaí agus nach féidir é/í a dhúisiú
• fail to respond normally to questions or conversation (not due to the influence of alcohol alone)
• nach bhfuil ag freagairt ceisteanna ar ghnáthbhealach nó in ann comhrá (ar chúiseanna nach mbaineann le halcól amháin)
• appear to the member in charge to be suffering from a mental illness or
• i mbarúil an Garda atá i gceannas ag fulaingt ó thinneas intinne nó
• otherwise appear to the member in charge to need medical attention,
• i mbarúil an Garda i gceannas i staid go dteastaíonn cóir leighis uaidh/uaithi
the member in charge of the station must summon a doctor unless your condition appears to require removal to a hospital
ní mór don Gharda i gceannas glaoch isteach ar dhochtúir ach amháin sa chás go méasann an Garda gur ceart an duine a thabhairt chuig an ospideál
Medical advice will be sought if you claim to need medication relating to a heart condition, diabetes, epilepsy or other potentially serious condition
Cuirfear fios ar chomhairle dochtúra má dheireann duine go dteastaíonn leigheas uaidh/uaithi a bhaineann le fadhb croí, le diabaetas, titeamas, nó aon drochthinneas eile
It may also be sought if the member in charge of the station considers it necessary because you have such medication in your possession
Is féidir leis an nGarda atá i gceannas an comhairle dochtúra sin a lorg freisin má cheapann sé/sí go bhfuil gá leis má tá leigheas a bhaineann leis an tinneas sin i seilbh an duine
If you are removed to a hospital, the removal must be recorded
Ní mór taifead a choinneál má thugtar chuig an ospidéal duine
Any instructions given by a doctor about your medical care and steps taken to comply with the instructions should also be recorded
Má thugann dochtúir aon treoracha maidir le cúram leighis an duine agus céimeanna nach mór a thógáil leis na treoracha sin a chomhlíonadh ní mór taifead a dhéanamh daoibh freisin
If you ask to be examined by a doctor of your choice at your own expense, the member in charge of the station must make the necessary arrangements
Má éilíonn duine scrúdú dochtúra óna rogha dochtúra ar a c(h)ostas féin, ní mór don Gharda i gceannas na socruithe cuí a dhéanamh
If you are removed to hospital, an immediate relative and any other person required to be notified shall be informed
Má thugtar duine chuig an ospidéal, ní mór scéal a chur chuig gaol gairid nó chuig aon duine eile cuí
